# Órìṣà

## Ori

Ori is your personal Órìṣà. It's the spiritual higher self, our intuition, and personal spritual guide. Ori is the keeper of our destiny and the one who guides us to our purpose on Aye(Earth). Every living being is born with an Ori. Blessing cannot occur without the permission of Ori. When in alignment with ourselfs and Ori, we are able to manifest our destiny. When were are not in alignment ourselves we can turn blessings away.
